data.title: Mota Engil SGPS SA Share Price - ELI:EGL Stock Research
meta_keywords: Mota Engil SGPS SA share price
data.meta_description: Discover all the factors affecting Mota Engil SGPS SA's share price. EGL is currently rated as a Super Stock | Stockopedia
data.text:
The analyst consensus target price for shares in Mota Engil SGPS SA is €5.50. That is 49.7% above the last closing price of €3.67.

Analysts covering Mota Engil SGPS SA currently have a consensus Earnings Per Share (EPS) forecast of €0.34 for the next financial year.

Find out more

An important predictor of whether a stock price will go up is its track record of momentum. Price trends tend to persist, so it's worth looking at them when it comes to a share like Mota Engil SGPS SA . Over the past six months, its share price has underperformed the FTSE Global All Cap Index by -14.25%.

As of the last closing price of €3.67, shares in Mota Engil SGPS SA were trading -10.36% below their 200 day moving average. You can read more about the power of momentum in assessing share price movements on Stockopedia.

The Mota Engil SGPS SA PE ratio based on its reported earnings over the past 12 months is 9.9. The shares last closed at €3.67.

The PE ratio (or price-to-earnings ratio) is the one of the most popular valuation measures used by stock market investors. It is calculated by dividing a company's price per share by its earnings per share.

The PE ratio can be seen as being expressed in years, in the sense that it shows the number of years of earnings which would be required to pay back the purchase price, ignoring inflation. So in general terms, the higher the PE, the more expensive the stock is.
